text: San Nazzaro may refer to the following places: ==Italy== *San Nazzaro, Campania, a comune in the Province of Benevento *San Nazzaro Sesia, a comune in the Province of Novara, Piedmont *San Nazzaro Val Cavargna, a comune in the Province of Como, Lombardy ==Switzerland== *San Nazzaro, Switzerland, a former comune in the Canton of Ticino
title: San Nazzaro
